# REQUIREMENTS # http://www.thegeekstuff.com/2016/02/docker-machine-create-generic/ # passwordless or use ssh agent
# DOCKER ISSUE # The only temporary fix is to let your user explicitly allow sudo to be used without a password. # edit /etc/sudoers and add YOURUSERNAME ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL # This is until #1586 is merged
# TIPS on try # sudo journalctl -fu docker.service # sudo systemctl start docker # always check /etc/systemd/system/docker.service if daemon did not run
echo "start_consul ..."
nameMachine=$variables_instance_name sshUser=$variables_userSSH
docker-machine create --driver generic --generic-ip-address localhost --generic-ssh-user $sshUser ${nameMachine}-consul-machine docker $(docker-machine config ${nameMachine}-consul-machine) run -d --restart=always -p $variables_dashboard_port":8500" -h "consul" --name ${nameMachine}-swarm-consul progrium/consul -server -bootstrap
echo "... start_consul"

echo "start_swarm_master ..."
sshUser=$variables_userSSH nameMachine=$variables_instance_name networkInterfaceSwarm=$(ssh -T $sshUser@localhost "ip route get 8.8.8.8" | awk '{ print $5; exit }') consul_machine_ip=$(docker-machine ip ${nameMachine}-consul-machine)
docker-machine create --driver generic --generic-ip-address localhost --generic-ssh-user $sshUser --swarm --swarm-master --swarm-discovery="consul://$consul_machine_ip:8500" --engine-opt="cluster-store=consul://$consul_machine_ip:8500" --engine-opt="cluster-advertise=${networkInterfaceSwarm}:2376" $nameMachine
echo "... start_swarm_master"

echo "start_swarm_agents ..."
swarm_agents_IP_addresses=$variables_swarm_agents_IP_addresses sshUser=$variables_userSSH nameMachine=$variables_instance_name task_id=$variables_PA_TASK_REPLICATION consul_machine_ip=$(docker-machine ip ${nameMachine}-consul-machine)
networkInterfaceSwarm=$(ssh -T $sshUser@localhost "ip route get 8.8.8.8" | awk '{ print $5; exit }'); docker-machine create --driver generic --generic-ip-address localhost --generic-ssh-user $sshUser --swarm --swarm-discovery="consul://$consul_machine_ip:8500" --engine-opt="cluster-store=consul://$consul_machine_ip:8500" --engine-opt="cluster-advertise=${networkInterfaceSwarm}:2376" ${nameMachine}-swarm-node-$task_id;
echo "... start_swarm_agents"
